article_title: Israeli hostage, 25, confirmed killed in Gaza.
sentence: Israeli  hostage,  25,  confirmed  killed  in  Gaza.

article_title: Israeli hostage, 25, confirmed killed in Gaza.
sentence: One  of  the  Israelis  being  held  hostage  in  the  Gaza  Strip,  Sahar  Baruch,  25,  has  been  killed  in  the  territory,  his  kibbutz  and  families  of  hostages  said  in  a  statement.
